How can i rotate kerbals vertically while EVA with the jet pack?

Q and E rotates Horizontal but need to ratete em in Y axis

any help?

Unfortunately Kerbals seem tied to the camera plane so rotating them vertically is only possible to a very limited degree.

Press V to change camera mode, your Kerbals will align themselves to the new camera angle when you next move them.
IIRC, you can click and drag up or down, and that will change the Kerbal's pitch.
yes it changes kerbals pitch but when u hit any key to move em again they return to its original anglre =(
Hold down the mouse, it might keep the Kerbal facing the same way if you only thrust forward. Not sure about this though.
point the camera where you want the kerbal facing and hit the spacebar

You can set "EVA_ROTATE_ON_MOVE = False" in the settings.cfg to stop the auto-rotating behaviour, then the direction you point them in with the cursor dragging will be the direction they move. Spacebar still resets their attitude to the camera.
